page.title: 02HOUSING IN ALL ASPECTS
page.content: {TOTAL NUMBER OF HOUSES OF ALL KINDS IN {BLOCK ABOUT 400.HOUSES OVER 100 YEARS {OLD,UNRENOVATED.}Few in number and scattered throughout area. Represent about 5% of total. {HOUSES OVER 100 YEARS OLD, {MODERNISED. Increasing in number,aided by grants from Government and Local Govt, well distributed,accounting for between 10% and 15% of of total houses in block. {HOUSES BETWEEN 50-100 YEARS OLD. Account for about 20% of housing total. {HOUSES LESS THAN 50 YEARS OLD.} Represent balance of housing. Concentrated in three main areas. 1.Outskirts of Bideford,square 4. 2.Fairy Cross area,square 5. 3.West and centre of Littleham,square 12
